name: Dannielle HADLEY, Petitioner v. PHILADELPHIA COURTS and Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole, Respondents

judges: Justice EAKIN did not participate in the decision of this matter.
parties: Dannielle HADLEY, Petitioner v. PHILADELPHIA COURTS and Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 29th day of December, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED.
Justice EAKIN did not participate in the decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
129 A.3d 1236
Dannielle HADLEY, Petitioner v. PHILADELPHIA COURTS and Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole, Respondents.
No. 144 EM 2015.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 29, 2015.
